response.summary: Mechatronic engineer with wide knowledge in instrumentation and industrial automation. Experience in executing, controlling and following up of automation projects in differents industries like Oil&Gas, Food&Beverage and pharmaceutical. Detailed knowledge in industrial comunication protocols as Profibus, HART, Foundation FieldBus, Ethernet IP. Wide experience developing control architectures, basic and detailed enginnering for industrial automation systems. Most relevant achievements: Technical leader/resident engineer in project:"automation of Empresa de Licores de Cundinamarca´s plant". Design, procurement, construction and commisioning of the most complex instrumentation and automation training center in South America: PTU
response.skills: Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Microsoft Office, Dirección, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Ventas, Planificación estratégica, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Servicio de atención al cliente, Instrumentación industrial, Procesos industriales, Inglés, Petróleo y gas natural, Planificación de proyectos, Puesta en marcha, Automatización industrial, Control de procesos, Negociación, Energía

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de proyectos para sistemas de generación de vapor. Detección y evaluación de oportunidades de mejora en sistemas de generación y distribución de vapor.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de proyecto

profile_positions.description:
Provide technical and commercial support to the sales force for the achievement of projects in different types of industries (Food&Beverage, Oil&Gas, chemical, pharmaceutical, etc.).
Prepare, schedule, coordinate and monitor the nationwide assigned projects. Interact with customers to interpret their requirements and needs and represent them at field or plant. Perform quality control of work: schedule, budget and scope. Review of engineering deliverables. Communicate to the project manager and stakeholders to provide technical support and assistance.
Most important achievement: execution of the project: Automation of the production plant of “Empresa de Licores de Cundinamarca”.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description: Performing accompaniments during commissioning of measuring systems in different types of industries (Oil & Gas), foods and beverages, energy. Verify the selection of instruments associated with measurement applications (flow, level, temperature, pressure, analysis of liquids and gases). Performing advice to clients for the configuration of measurement applications to be installed in plant. Implement projects related to engineering and construction of facilities for monitoring and control of industrial processes.
profile_positions.title: Measurement engineer

profile_positions.description: Provide technical support to the sales force for selection of instrumentation for Oil & Gas sector. Develop basic designs of flow measurement skids for loading and offloading stations of tanker trucks. Plan and execute the different projects awarded to the company related to the automation and control of different processes carried out in the oil&gas, foods and beverages and energy industries. Coordinate assemblies and installations that are made in start-up projects and modernization in industrial plants. Leading the quote process of different automation projects in different industries. Field experience (downstream), configuration and commissioning of instrumentation in different industries: oil production fields, food plants. Implementation of remote monitoring systems (pressure, flow and temperature in production facilities). Development and supervision of modernization projects in different types of plants and industries.
profile_positions.title: Application enginer

company.name: Sensia Global
company.description:
Sensia represents the unification of sensing, intelligence and action.

We bring together the best of the best: the pioneering process automation, real-time control and IoT technologies of Rockwell Automation, combined with the unmatched measurement and instrument, software and analytics capabilities of Schlumberger.

Sensia is further strengthened by the oil and gas domain expertise and artificial lift experience shared by Rockwell Automation and Schlumberger.

The result is Sensia - the leading automation specialist in oil and gas production, transportation and processing with a team of more than 1,000 experts serving customers globally in more than 80 countries.

As the first fully-integrated oilfield automation solutions provider, Sensia makes the production, transportation and processing of oil and gas simpler, safer, more secure, more productive and better understood from end to end.

Now every oil and gas company can experience the advantages of industrial-scale digitalization and seamless automation, enabling each asset to operate more productively and more profitably.
